pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.5: Kassa sampannaṃ na manāpaṃ, kassa sāduṃ na ruccatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā, bhikkhuniyo khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.15: “Yā pana bhikkhunī khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.16: ‘gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.1.17: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gilānā honti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.2.4: “Pubbe mayaṃ, ayye, khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjāma, tena no phāsu hoti;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.2.5: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.2.7: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.2.8: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.2.9: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:1.2.10: ‘gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:2.1.8: yassā vinā khīrena na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:2.1.10: gokhīraṃ vā ajikākhīraṃ vā mahiṃsakhīraṃ vā yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati tesaṃ khīraṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:2.1.11: Agilānā attano atthāya viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:2.2.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:2.2.2: Agilānā vematikā khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd7:2.2.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
